overview: "Production of Gold" is the first Deslegendário Webseries and finally we give you the prologue of this dystopia. Once again, Lucas Stuvok has his sleep interrupted by some madman who plays the idea of him doing something with no concept with his friends, it is the fool's turn to produce any audiovisual content for a festival that promises to give fame prize and money to the one who can perform a Gold Production!
title: Produção de Ouro: Prólogo
